message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to let it go for $120.
I really like the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Can you meet me at that price?
I understand you like the product, Bob, but I was thinking more along the lines of $110. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit.
I'm not sure I can go as high as $110, but I'm willing to meet you in the middle. How about $95?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me in the middle, Bob, but I'm still a bit higher on the price. How about $105? I'm willing to compromise, but I need to make a decent profit.
I understand you want to make a profit, but I'm not comfortable with $105. I'm willing to go up to $92.50. Can we meet at this price?
I appreciate your flexibility, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $92.50. I'll meet you halfway between $105 and $92.50, so how about $98.75? I think we can find a mutually beneficial price.
I'm starting to think that I can find a better deal elsewhere. I'll make one last offer of $90. If you're not willing to meet me at this price, I'll have to consider buying from John for $80
